channel.title: [RELEASE] TkoScape 562/602| Chaotics | Flawless Pking & More! [RELEASE]
channel.description:
Hello & Welcome to my first release! This isn't really my release but I just decided to release this for my first post. It is Apache Ah64's work (TkoScape). Yes he gave permission because if he didn't why would he release? Get the picture? ;D Anyways, enjoy!!
Quote from Apache Ah64.
[QUOTE]Hey, Im getting mad of TkoScape so i decided to release it. This doesnt have any anti leeches anymore or other shit its free to use but dont take my fucking credits.[/QUOTE]
Please look over the infomation, pictures and downloads. -Sevendor
[b][u]TkoScape Info:[/u][/b] Browser-based webclient. RAR download client. 100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin. Great shops. Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin. Perfect range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them. Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent. Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores. Experienced staff members. All chaotic weapons. Primal armour, fractite armour, etc. Newer bosses to challenge. Chat effects (e.i. - green:shake: Hello) Player following. Clan chat. Loot Share. One click npc attacking. One click player attacking. One click npc trade. Colored whips(Fixed animations). Staff of Light. New spirit shields.
[b][u]Other Details[/u][/b] All skills fully trainable. Clanwars safe and non-safe pking. Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose. Plenty of bosses with rare drops. Full screen high definition available. Thieving for cash. Dragon platebodys. Pets that follow you. All godswords fulling working. Dragon fireshield. Dragon claws with fully working special. All PVP armour and weapons. Bandos and Armadyl armour. Great website. Vote 4 Cash. Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items). New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one). All skillcapes and emotions. Trading interfaces fixed. God Wars Dungeon. Barrows mini-game. Soul wars mini-game. Pest control mini-game.
[b]TkoScape Media:[/b] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoeco.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkopvp.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoshops.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkobank.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkopin.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkocurses.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoplayers.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoachiev.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoclan.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/tkoveng.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.tkoscape.info/images/clogo.png[/img]
[b]Download Links:[/b] Download Source: http://www.rspscoding.org/Releases/TkoScape.rar Download Client: http://www.rspscoding.org/Releases/TkoScape_Client.rar Download Cache: (Send Me A Pm If You Need The Cache) :D
[b]Need help removing the logo in the client? No problem![/b] (JUST SEND ME A PM)
[b]Need help changing the client IP? No problem![/b] (JUST SEND ME A PM)
[b]Need help making it a webclient? No problem![/b] (JUST SEND ME A PM)
[b]Credits:[/b] - Apache Ah64 - Dragonkk - Mystic Flow - 'Sevendor (ME, for uploading cache)

item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“mewrensel, post:16, topic:453525”]1st of all,
All 600+ Sources Need To be Ran By Jre6 And If You have Both Then make it a path heres the code it should be in the run.bat[/quote]

item.title: [RELEASE] TkoScape 562/602| Chaotics | Flawless Pking & More! [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @mewrensel mewrensel
item.description:
@mewrensel wrote:

1st of all,
All 600+ Sources Need To be Ran By Jre6 And If You have Both Then make it a path heres the code it should be in the run.bat

@echo off
title TkoScape by Apache Ah64
Color 4
cd src
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main
pause

Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] TkoScape 562/602| Chaotics | Flawless Pking & More! [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Sevendor Sevendor
item.description:
@Sevendor wrote:

Hello & Welcome to my first release! This isn’t really my release but I just decided to release this for my first post. It is Apache Ah64’s work (TkoScape).
Yes he gave permission because if he didn’t why would he release? Get the picture? ;D
Anyways, enjoy!!

Quote from Apache Ah64.

[QUOTE]Hey,
Im getting mad of TkoScape so i decided to release it. This doesnt have any anti leeches anymore or other shit its free to use but dont take my fucking credits.[/QUOTE]

Please look over the infomation, pictures and downloads. -Sevendor

TkoScape Info:
Browser-based webclient.
RAR download client.
100% Runescape bank pins that you can reset if you forget the pin.
Great shops.
Cash limits, so all your hard earned money wont reset to 1 coin.
Perfect range, stand far away from monsters wile you attack them.
Range requires arrows, then you can collect them after you have killed your opponent.
Shops fixed, no more having to close and reopen the stores.
Experienced staff members.
All chaotic weapons.
Primal armour, fractite armour, etc.
Newer bosses to challenge.
Chat effects (e.i. - green:shake: Hello)
Player following.
Clan chat.
Loot Share.
One click npc attacking.
One click player attacking.
One click npc trade.
Colored whips(Fixed animations).
Staff of Light.
New spirit shields.

Other Details
All skills fully trainable.
Clanwars safe and non-safe pking.
Bank tabs allowing you to organize your bank however you choose.
Plenty of bosses with rare drops.
Full screen high definition available.
Thieving for cash.
Dragon platebodys.
Pets that follow you.
All godswords fulling working.
Dragon fireshield.
Dragon claws with fully working special.
All PVP armour and weapons.
Bandos and Armadyl armour.
Great website.
Vote 4 Cash.
Crystal keys to open the magic chest (gives rare items).
New whip attack emotes (fixed to real one).
All skillcapes and emotions.
Trading interfaces fixed.
God Wars Dungeon.
Barrows mini-game.
Soul wars mini-game.
Pest control mini-game.

TkoScape Media:










Download Links:
Download Source: http://www.rspscoding.org/Releases/TkoScape.rar
Download Client: http://www.rspscoding.org/Releases/TkoScape_Client.rar
Download Cache: (Send Me A Pm If You Need The Cache)

Need help removing the logo in the client? No problem!
(JUST SEND ME A PM)

Need help changing the client IP? No problem!
(JUST SEND ME A PM)

Need help making it a webclient? No problem!
(JUST SEND ME A PM)

Credits:

  • Apache Ah64
  • Dragonkk
  • Mystic Flow
  • 'Sevendor (ME, for uploading cache)

Read full topic
